mapper.insert: INSERT into plan(user_id, start_date, end_date, price, plan_title, plan_detail, plan_detail_img) values (#{user_id},#{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{price}, #{plan_title}, #{plan_detail}, #{plan_detail_img})
mapper.select: select plan_idx, plan_title, price, user_id from plan where p_del_yn = 'N' and user_id like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') plan_title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') 1=1 order by plan_idx desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(plan_idx) from plan where p_del_yn = 'N' and user_id like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') plan_title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') 1=1
mapper.update: update plan set plan_title = #{plan_title}, plan_detail=#{plan_detail}, start_date=#{start_date}, end_date=#{end_date}, price=#{price} where plan_idx = #{plan_idx}
